name: Wanderlost
storyline: Thrust into the wilderness with little beyond the clothes on his back the player must navigate a hostile wilderness teeming with zombies and wildlife. Finding food, water, and shelter are three musts but can the player move beyond mere survival to sustainable living, safety, and even domination of their environment?
summary: Survive the adorable apocalypse by exploring, crafting, hunting, trapping, and building a new home base.
